item.description:
WMFO’s DJ Easy Ed Presents: Rockabilly, Rock ‘n’ Roll, and Hillbilly Bop

Starring The Barley Hoppers--featuring Stan “the Man” Kozlowski (Cranktones, Spurs)

Lynnette and the Longshots--a brand new band, with Lynnette from the Stumbleweeds. Debut Performance!

+ Easy Ed’s Record Hop: He'll be spinning the dance-friendly rockin' platters early, between bands, and late. Come on down and bop around!

August 11, 2012

Doors: 8:00 PM

Admission: $7.00

See the cool event poster (designed by Kathy Wade) here:

https://www.facebook.com/events/197710580346049/
item.name: Lynnette and the Long Shots, The Barley Hoppers, DJ Easy Ed
